text: Pilus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudococculinidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Pilus include: * Pilus conicus (Verrill, 1884) ==References== * Gofas, S.; Le Renard, J.; Bouchet, P. (2001). Mollusca, in: Costello, M.J. et al. (Ed.) (2001). European register of marine species: a check-list of the marine species in Europe and a bibliography of guides to their identification. Collection Patrimoines Naturels, 50: pp. 180–213 Category:Pseudococculinidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Pilus (gastropod)
